Articles.Content: I wonder... What can we expect from playing the Enhanced Edition on PlayStation 5? Will the game work on the new system? Will it be optimised for it? Can we expect a more stable game?

KSP 1, Well, i guess so but probably not, i really dont know.

But KSP 2 Is totally gonna have a enhanced edition for ps5

On 9/27/2020 at 4:24 AM, MZ_per_X1 said:

I wonder... What can we expect from playing the Enhanced Edition on PlayStation 5? Will the game work on the new system? Will it be optimised for it? Can we expect a more stable game? 

We havent a god darn clue.

The possibly of KSP on PS5 is probably 10% or less. KSP doesn’t have enough players of the people to do so. Unless KSP becomes like the top 10 games of simulations it won’t have a PS5 probably. But KSP2 has a higher chance in getting to PS5 but that’s kinda like a 50 50. And KSP2 would have to be really popular among the gaming world. But it isn’t yet. So. Unless KSP2 get popular enough. Actually I take that back. KSP2 would have to be on PS5 to catch up the th market. And so ther you have it!
